SELECT COUNT(A.NO) FROM ACCOUNT A WHERE A.WRITER_NO = ${no} AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
AND A.CONTENT LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND TO_CHAR(A.ACCOUNT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND ACCOUNT_CNO LIKE '%${searchValue}%'

SELECT A.NO AS NO ,A.CONTENT AS CONTENT ,A.PRICE AS PRICE ,TO_CHAR(A.ACCOUNT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ACCOUNT_DATE ,AC.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME ,A.ACCOUNT_CNO AS ACCOUNT_CNO FROM ACCOUNT A JOIN ACCOUNT_CATEGORY AC ON A.ACCOUNT_CNO = AC.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON A.WRITER_NO = M.NO WHERE A.WRITER_NO = ${no} AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
AND A.CONTENT LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND TO_CHAR(A.ACCOUNT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND ACCOUNT_CNO LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY A.ACCOUNT_DATE DESC

SELECT A.NO AS NO ,A.CONTENT AS CONTENT ,A.PRICE AS PRICE ,TO_CHAR(A.ACCOUNT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ACCOUNT_DATE ,AC.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME ,A.ACCOUNT_CNO AS ACCOUNT_CNO FROM ACCOUNT A JOIN ACCOUNT_CATEGORY AC ON A.ACCOUNT_CNO = AC.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON A.WRITER_NO = M.NO WHERE A.WRITER_NO = #{no} AND A.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.ACCOUNT_DATE DESC

SELECT A.NO AS NO ,A.CONTENT AS CONTENT ,A.PRICE AS PRICE ,TO_CHAR(A.ACCOUNT_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') AS ACCOUNT_DATE ,AC.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME FROM ACCOUNT A JOIN ACCOUNT_CATEGORY AC ON A.ACCOUNT_CNO = AC.NO WHERE A.NO = #{no} AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT AC.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME ,SUM(A.PRICE) AS PRICE_CNT FROM ACCOUNT A JOIN ACCOUNT_CATEGORY AC ON (A.ACCOUNT_CNO = AC.NO) WHERE A.WRITER_NO = #{no} AND A.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY AC.NAME
